dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, two old friends meet again after many years.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogues.text: Ah, Lyra! It's been ages since we last spoke. I see the fire in your eyes still burns bright.

dialogues.speaker: Lyra Flynn
dialogues.text: Eryndor, you always knew how to make an entrance. What brings you back to Willowdale?
